DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess glycemic response cycle road race ( use continuous glucose monitoring ) elite athlete type 1 diabetes non-diabetic control . The investigator also assess relationship power/work cycling ( use power meter ) subject 's glucose profile .
DOC.brief_title: Glycemic Response Road Cycling Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: ≥18 year age A1C ≤8.0 % diagnose type 1 DM If diagnose type 1 diabetes , recurrent severe hypoglycemia ( great 2 episode previous 6 month require assistance third party ) Has medical condition medical history may affect successful completion study and/or personal wellbeing ( assessed PI )
